request_review.not_suggestion_channel: You cannot send threads in non-suggestion channels for review!

request_review.not_own_thread: You cannot request a review on a thread you did not create!

request_review.bad_reaction_ratio: You need at least a %d%% agree ratio to request a review!
request_review.too_new: This suggestion is too new to request a review!
request_review.success: This suggestion has been sent for review!
request_review.accepted: Your recent review request has been accepted! Thank you for your suggestion!
request_review.changes_requested: Your recent review request has been denied. We recommend you review your suggestion and make any necessary changes before requesting another review. Thank you!
request_review.locked: We have reviewed your recent request and have decided to lock this suggestion. If you believe this to be a mistake or would like more information, please contact us through Mod Mail.

role.invalid_role: Could not find a role with ID `%s`!

role.added_role: Added role %s to you! Use the same command to remove it.

verify.request_sent: Your verification request has been sent. You will be contacted via DM if any further information is required.
